entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
